Windows.name: Windows
Windows.requirements: Windows 10 (version 1607) or newer (Intel or AMD processors only)
Windows.items_added:
(Metadata) Add support for additional TVDB episode orderings on TV Show preferences. Requires metadata refresh. (PM-1533)
(Web) Updated to 4.132.2
Windows.items_fixed:
(Library) Multi-episode files will only retain one of the episodes (PM-1603)
(Live-TV) Tuning slots were not properly released if the tune was canceled during startup, such as what happens when rapidly changing channels. (PM-688)
(Scanner) Removed deprecated support for modern metadata agent scan/refresh via Scanner cli (PM-1555)
(Scanner) Scanner would not ignore
(Scanner) Scanner would not ignore @eaDir copy directories (PM-1396)
(Serialization) The viewUpdatedAt field would not be included when requested (PM-1562)
(Transcoder) Corrected quality parameter for devices without rate control. (#14885)
(Transcoder) Windows would fail to HW transcode after an RDP session is started or ended. (#14926)
